Spark Copilot is your cold outreach copilot. Use Spark to help you research, qualify, and generate outreach ideas based on your prospects online presence.

Spark Copilot is still in an alpha preview, so please notify the developer, sparkcopilot@gmail.com, if there are any bugs. We also welcome feature requests. Thanks!
